#labels Phase-Deploy
= Taxoner database =

The Taxoner database are created .....

  # Bacteria (bact.0.fasta, bact.1.fasta, bact.2.fasta, bact.3.fasta)
  # Archaea (archaea.0.fasta)
  # Viruses (virus.0.fasta)
  # Fungi (fungi.0.fasta)

The database is available from [http://pongor.itk.ppke.hu/~roberto/taxoner/bowtie2/ here]

Get the full directory contents and put it in the <i>databases/bowtie2/</i> folder on the Taxoner folder.

{{{
    cd databases
    wget -r --reject "index.html*" -e robots=off -np -nH --cut-dirs=2 http://pongor.itk.ppke.hu/~roberto/taxoner/bowtie2/
}}}
